sentences.sContent: When come to the pure, clear, quiet, relucent and beauteous Lugu Lake, welcome you to A-pu Country House, and while you discover the splendor, share your sprightliness.
sentences.sContent_eng: When come to the pure, clear, quiet, relucent and beauteous Lugu Lake, welcome you to A-pu Country House, and while you discover the splendor, share your sprightliness.
sentences.sCn: 当你来到清纯、宁静、亮丽的泸沽湖，希望走进 “阿普驿馆”，发现精彩的同时，分享你的快乐。
